get.summary: Retrieve Revenues for a Specific Period
get.description: Returns revenues and the number of orders for a given period. If the breakdown parameter is provided, the data is segmented by time slots. The averageWaitingTime field only appears if useCase is defined.

parameters.name: timeBegin
parameters.description: Start date of the analysis period (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: timeEnd
parameters.description: End date of the analysis period (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: breakdown
parameters.description: Duration in minutes for segmenting data by time slots (optional)

parameters.name: useCase
parameters.description: Use case (POS or KDS) - if defined, includes averageWaitingTime in the response

averageWaitingTime.description: Average waiting time (only present if useCase is defined)

oneOf.description: Response with breakdown by time slots

ordersCount.description: Number of orders for this slot

averageWaitingTime.description: Average waiting time for this slot (only present if useCase is defined)
